node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Great Break
node.description: A sudden break in the cliffs prohibits any further travel. Known as the Great Break, this jagged rift separates the southern end of the riverbed from its northern part. Far down at the bottom of the Great Break is a landscape of treetops, and the hint of a small lake. Beyond it, the riverbed continues its winding course into a dusty, far-off horizon.

node.name: Siergelde Cliffs, Meander
node.description: The riverbed continues its lazy maneuver over the landscape at the cliff's edge. Clipped grasses spread along the outer edge of the path, but everything adjacent to the riverbed is dry and dusty.

node.name: Pear Tree, Canopy
node.description: The leafy treetop forms a secure if spongy carpet beneath you, fanning out in all directions like a shimmering umbrella. Tantalizing vreeland pears hang just out of reach, golden brown and tempting. You can climb down the way you came up, or rest here for a bit.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: A large bramble patch seems to block any hope of movement to the south. In the thick loam beneath the trees a barely visible path heads northeast.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: The trees thin out a little here giving more light to the undergrowth. Several clusters of bright red, sharp yellow and deep blue flowers help break up the green and brown monotony of the forest. To the north through the tree tops some mountain peaks are barely visible.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: A jagged stump as large around as a table sticks dangerously out of the ground. It looks as if a group of mad lumberjacks hacked at a tree with hand axes before the upper portion finally ripped away from the stump. Leading from the stump, deep ruts in the ground head northeast.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: The path is marred with deep ruts which lead to the ragged end of a large felled tree. Some of the tree's branches have gotten caught on the surrounding bushes preventing it from being dragged any further. Fortunately, the tree was shoved somewhat off the northern side of path giving barely enough room to continue northeast.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: The path disappears here amid small bushes and tall trees. High overhead, a battered hip boot swings casually in the wind apparently caught at the ankle by a snare. More tripped, but empty snares dangle from various tree limbs, silent testimony to their makers lack of skill.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: A group of squirrels cavorts in the undergrowth and dry leaves. Suddenly one of them dashes part way up a tree, only to be soundly chittered at by the others. He dives down among them, rolling several end over end, before disappearing into a bush.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: Nestled beneath some large ferns, an old lean-to offers a little protection from the elements. In front of it, a well-used fire pit and a poorly hidden cache of fire wood suggests that there are frequent visitors here.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: Hundreds of bees fly in and out of this area, at times coming dangerously close. Their activity seems to be centered around a hollowed trunk which they've converted into a Gor'tog-sized hive.

node.name: Wilderness, Deep Forest
node.description: To the north, the dense forest is interrupted by a dry creek bed running roughly east and west. The edge of the creek has eroded creating a gentle slope down to the bed.

node.name: Wilderness, Dry Creek Bed
node.description: It's been some time since water has flowed through this creek bed. The hollows and low points of the bed have filled with leaves and dirt. The southern lip of the creek has eroded creating a gentle slope up.

node.name: Wilderness, Dry Creek Bed
node.description: In sharp contrast to the thriving forest to the north and south, a small, lanky flowering bush clings to life on the rocky bed. Though sunlight is plentiful, there is barely enough soil or water to sustain it.

node.name: Wilderness, Dry Creek Bed
node.description: From the west, the sounds of flowing water and a flash of blue indicate that a river is close by. The silt and sand partially covering the creek bed and a few small pockets of fresh water suggest that the river level sometimes raises enough to allow water up this far.

node.name: Wilderness, River's Edge
node.description: A wide band of smooth rocks and pebbles runs between the placid river to the west and the dense forest to the east. When the river is at its fullest, this area is probably underwater. A couple of fishing poles have been propped up near the water's edge, their lines trailing far downstream.

node.name: Wilderness, Dry Creek Bed
node.description: Completely oblivious to any other activity, a pair of ravens argue over a single shiny rock embedded in the creek bed. At various times, each one manages to land briefly and work at prying the stone loose before the other swoops down and knocks its competitor away.

node.name: Wilderness, Dry Creek Bed
node.description: Dusty footprints weave back and forth between the banks of the creek bed. The partly exposed roots of a tree up on the north bank serve as a reminder that once water flowed swiftly through here.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest Fen
node.description: The ground slopes abruptly down from the creek bed into a small fen. Once a large pond, a slow decrease in water has allowed marsh grasses and flowers to flourish. The sounds of crickets and frogs fill the air with a pleasant melody.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest Fen
node.description: The foul smell of long standing water and decaying plants fills the air. A boot lies half buried in the thick, goopy mud that covers the area. To the north, a mountain range looms over the tree tops.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest Fen
node.description: The remnants of a beaver dam occupy much of this area. Marsh grasses and a few small bushes push up through the graying tangle of tree branches and sapling trunks. Amid the wreckage are signs of bird nests and small animal burrows.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest Fen
node.description: The forest to the north is eagerly encroaching on the marsh grasses and flowers. Several young saplings compete for sunlight and air with a variety of bushes.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest Fen
node.description: A shallow algae-filled pond occupies the center of this area. Dragonflies buzz around, darting up and down over the water before disappearing amid the tall marsh grass. To the north, the upper peaks of the mountains can barely be seen above the forest.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: A high bank overlooks the dry creek bed to the south. At some point the bank eroded, partially exposing the roots of a tall satinwood. When the breeze tugs at the tree's upper canopy, the tree creaks ominously and the ground shudders slightly.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The air is heavy with the vanilla-sweet smell of some flowering bushes that cover the area. Hummingbirds dart among the pale yellow flowers, stopping now and again for a sip of nectar.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The trees line both sides of the path, arching together to form a mottled green canopy overhead that looks more like the ceiling of an elaborate temple. Flowers and ferns carpet the area beneath the trees.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: A few blackened tree trunks stand in a large burned out area. The tallest among them has been split in two apparently by a lightning bolt. Half the trunk remains standing while the other half lies twisted and scarred among the burned out undergrowth.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: A large wilted bramble bush looks oddly out of place among the ferns and satinwood trees in the area. Even more odd, what looks like its roots, still partially covered in dirt, stick out from the top of the bush.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The path ends suddenly in a large pit. Part of the pit is covered by a motley arrangement of tree branches barely concealed by a thin layer of dirt, leaves, and uprooted bushes. At the bottom of the pit, sharpened poles and jagged edged rocks point ominously upwards.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The southern end of the path disappears abruptly under a large wilted bramble bush. A few shriveled berries and flowers still cling to the bush. Around it, the other vegetation grows strong and lush beneath the satinwood trees.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: Bramble bushes compete with cinnamon ferns for light and space between the trees. Something has been helping the ferns along by ripping out and discarding some of the larger bushes.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The tall trees thin out, allowing the mountain range to the north to come suddenly into view. In the forefront a long ridge heads sharply up towards the closest peak. In the far distance to the east, the top of a smoking volcano can barely be seen.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: Crude drawings of hunts, battles, and weapons cover a large outcropping of rocks. Those drawn with chalk or paint are faded and partially gone, while others, carved into the surface, seemed destined to last forever.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: A loud crashing and thrashing from the bushes startles you. Suddenly, several deer come leaping across the area. In the distance can be heard a cougar's snarl, then an all too-brief bleating.

node.name: Wilderness, Forest
node.description: The path again disappears as the bushes and other undergrowth close in beneath the trees.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The rocky outcropping contains a small pocket of fresh water. Around the water, bold red and creamy white lilies flourish. Tracks of animals large and small can be seen in the mud at the water's edge.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The path threads its way through, over, and around large rocks and boulders. If it weren't for the looming ridge to the north, it would be difficult to keep track of directions.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: Part of the ridge has given way, partially covering the path. A wedge of land slid down the side a little way, leaving the trees and bushes in the wedge still standing, while those at the edge lean precariously at different angles.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The path turns sharply here heading to either side of the ridge. On a small hill to the northeast, a couple of large figures seem to be observing the path from a look-out platform built among the trees.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The ridge is not very steep here, but dense undergrowth still prevents anyone from climbing it. The trees are not as tall or as dense as in the lower forest, but there are still satinwoods and oaks mixed in with redbuds and dogwoods.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The path begins to slip away from the ridge towards a small valley nestled between the mountains. In the distance, a couple of smoke plumes rise above the forest before dissipating in the wind.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: There is a rustling sound in the undergrowth beyond a fallen tree. Suddenly, up pops a squirrel. He climbs up on the tree, stares around for a bit, then starts licking and cleaning his fur, pausing only to sniff at a tree beetle crawling nearby.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: An old wooden fence blocks the path continuing west. A half-open gate barely hangs on a post with a couple of shredded leather hinges. A gust of wind or a swift kick would probably knock the whole thing over.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The path crosses a large grassy clearing with a few scattered fire pits. Off to one side, the bed of a wagon lies abandoned on the ground. A broken axle and a couple of wheels are half-hidden in the taller grass nearby.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: Crickets and katydids fill the air with a hushed drone. Occasionally, the muted hoots of owls and the flapping of wings break the sleepy peace of the forest night.

The chirping and chattering of hundreds of sparrows in the trees above is almost deafening. Startled by something making noise in the bushes below, they suddenly take wing. In several large groups, they fly in and around the trees before settling back down.

node.name: Wilderness, Sparse Forest
node.description: The trees and undergrowth are so thick that little can be seen beyond the faint path. Ivy has grown at least part way up most of the trees, and sometimes between them, forming living veils.

node.name: Wilderness, Gully
node.description: An occasional glimpse of distant peaks can be caught through the leafy canopy to the north. The sounds of birdsong are muted, with only a faint melody breaking the silence. A dry streambed cuts across the forest floor, spanned by an old rope bridge that sways gently in the breeze.

node.name: Wilderness, Rope Bridge
node.description: The bridge creaks ominously underfoot. Jagged rocks fill the gully below, waiting for anyone foolish enough to tempt fate. Rolling hills are evident to the north, while a wall of trees presents itself south of the bridge.

node.name: Knife Clan, Sentry
node.note: Knife Clan|Kraelyst start point|travel start point
node.description: A lone Gor'Tog stands motionless, his dark leathers rendering him almost indistinguishable from the surrounding underbrush. The sentry's eyes scan constantly for signs of danger, the slightest movement instantly drawing his attention. A low wooden building can be glimpsed off to the west, while to the north the thinning forest gives way to hills. A rope bridge spans a dry gully south of here.

node.name: Knife Clan, Wooden Shack
node.description: An array of weaponry, mostly clubs and spears, lean against the side of a dilapidated shack. Muffled thumps from inside betray the presence of at least one occupant.

node.name: Knife Clan, Old Shack
node.description: Sagging cots are strewn about this tiny shack. Off duty sentries catch a few precious moments of sleep while they await their shifts. Only a few of the mattresses are presently occupied, but the sheer bulk of the slumbering guards is impressive.

node.name: Knife Clan, Rolling Hills
node.description: This beaten dirt path threads its way over lightly wooded hills. Outskirts of a small settlement can barely be made out to the north, against the backdrop of jagged peaks.

node.name: Knife Clan, Rolling Hills
node.description: Several fierce-looking Gor'Togs loiter about the entrance to a small cave. Dressed in brightly dyed leathers and carrying an impressive amount of weaponry, the Gor'Togs appear ready for battle at a moment's notice. The crackling of an open fire to the east fills the air.

node.name: Knife Clan, Bukor's Leatherworks
node.description: Low tables are pushed up against bare rock walls in this natural cavern. Carefully tanned furs and leathers are arranged haphazardly about the area, no thought having been given to a proper display. Bukor, a Gor'Tog of great skill but suspect taste, is well known in the Clan for his temper. He knows his work is excellent, and expects to be compensated accordingly.

node.name: Knife Clan, Back Room
node.description: A pine counter liberally spattered with a muddied rainbow of colors blocks passage deeper into the room. Near a dark curtain at the back of the shop can be seen several barrels of pigmented metallic powders stacked carelessly next to a large bucket of half-dried paint. Klurge, the proprieter of the operation, stands behind the counter, watching incoming customers with suspicious eyes. A color menu list is nailed to the wall to the left of the exit.

node.name: Knife Clan, Woodland's Edge
node.description: Rolling hills give way to wooded plains, the sounds of the forest a welcome relief from the bustle of the Gor'Tog settlement to the north. A beaten dirt path, worn from years of heavy use, leads deeper into the primeval wood.

node.name: Knife Clan, Woodland's Edge
node.description: Wooden buildings, a rare sight among the many cave dwellings, huddle about a clear pond. Though unadorned, their construction seems sound enough. Fingers of grey smoke curl into the air from the top of an unobtrusive shop.

node.name: Knife Clan, Rolling Hills
node.description: Caves honeycomb the rocky hills, providing shelter from the elements for the many warriors who inhabit the area. Gor'Togs cluster about, yelling to one another in booming shouts. Boisterous laughter splits the air, its origin impossible to determine. One particularly large cave entrance draws the eye.

node.name: Knife Clan, Firepit
node.description: Scorching heat rises from a roaring bonfire at the center of this sandy pit. A huge boar slowly rotates over the fire, sending the scent of burnt flesh wafting into the air. An elderly Gor'Tog, immensely strong despite his years, turns the spit with a steady rhythm.

node.name: Knife Clan, Rolling Hills
node.description: Towering mountains block out the sky and create a natural barrier protecting the Clan's flank. A wrought-iron gate, undoubtedly imposing in any other setting, pales in comparison. The portal seems oddly out of place amidst the rocky crags.

node.name: Knife Clan, Cavern
node.description: By far the largest cavern in Trefan Iltesh, this vast cave serves as both a central meeting place and, more frequently, as a giant arena. Opponents square off in the middle of a roughly circular pit carved into the rocky floor while onlookers gather about the edge and hurl insults or cheers as their champions' fortunes change. Smaller caverns breaking off from the main cave lead in several directions.

node.name: Knife Clan, Cavern
node.description: The sharp CRACK! of clashing weaponry echoes madly through this rocky chamber. Almost palpable waves of heat roll off grim-faced Gor'Togs as they flail at one another in preparation for their trials in the arena. Despite their bulk, opponents dance nimbly through the natural obstacles formed by thrusting stalagmites. A few heavy boulders have been pushed into one corner of the cavern.

node.name: Knife Clan, Shrine
node.description: The dim light from a few flickering torches is not enough to cut through the gloom that pervades this cramped alcove. The cold stone walls seem to close in on all sides. Against the far wall leans a carved granite statue of a fierce weasel, its small size oddly out of place among the giant Gor'Togs that inhabit these caves.

node.name: Knife Clan, Triage
node.description: Low groans rising from the injured fill the cramped alcove as wounded hunters and warriors receive aid. Mattresses line the walls, about half occupied by recovering patients. The floor is almost entirely covered by a dark red stain, paying testament to the enthusiasm of the field surgeons. An ominous bone saw leans against the wall, obviously a favorite method of treatment.

node.name: Knife Clan, Tobb's Smithy
node.description: Knives of all shapes, sizes, and descriptions occupy every available surface in this tiny shop. Care must be taken to avoid any sudden movement, or painful consequences may result. But despite the eccentricity of his establishment, Tobb the smith is almost revered by his patrons for the detailed craftsmanship with which he goes about his work.

node.name: Knife Clan, Woodland Trail
node.description: Gnarled branches claw at the air, and tangled roots seem intent on tripping the unwary. The fresh spoor of large game is apparent, a sure sign of plentiful hunting. A beaten dirt path leads back to the settlement.

node.name: Knife Clan, Primeval Glade
node.description: A circular clearing has been carved out of the dense wood, the lumber apparently used to construct the cabin that fills most of this break in the forest. Constant battle is obviously waged to prevent the surrounding underbrush from encroaching into the area.

node.name: Knife Clan, Woodlands
node.description: The wind lends a biting chill to the air as it whips through the trees. An eerie whistling originates from some oddly-shaped reeds. Perhaps because of the sound, wildlife seems to avoid this area.

node.name: Knife Clan, Woodlands
node.description: Ancient trees soar skyward here in the heart of the primeval forest. The mammoth trunks dwarf even the Gor'Tog hunters that frequent the glade in search of game. One blackened stump pays testament to the violent storms that sometimes frequent these lands.

node.name: Knife Clan, Deep Forest's Edge
node.description: Pale grey mosses grow in curtains among clustered trees. A black squirrel chirrs happily to himself as he scampers across an overhead limb. With a heroic leap, the squirrel hurls himself through the air, only to land triumphantly moments later on a distant branch.

node.name: Knife Clan, Deep Forest's Edge
node.description: A few taffelberry bushes have managed to find a niche here in the shadow of looming trees. From the bushes' rather barren appearance, the local wildlife has acquired quite a taste for the sweet berries.

node.name: Tower West, Air Floor
node.description: A dark grey carpet decorated with a pattern of crossing black lightning bolts covers the floor, matching the decoration on the grey-painted walls. A constant, low thrum hangs just inside the range of hearing, its source nearby but not readily apparent. Doors spaced in an even circle around the perimeter lead to initiates' private cells.

node.name: Tower West, Water Floor
node.description: Deep blue carpeting covers the floor, its surface cut in a manner that suggests the rippling of waves upon the surface of a lake. Bright blue spirals, representing the element of water, fill the walls between a series of doors leading to initiates' private cells. The air here is moist and cool upon the skin.

node.name: Tower West, Fire Floor
node.description: Lush, red carpeting covers the floor, muffling any ambient noise into oblivion. Images of bloated red suns, representing the element of fire, fill the walls between a series of doors leading to initiates' private cells. The air here is significantly warmer than on the tower's other floors, although the reason is not readily apparent.

node.name: Tower West, Aether Floor
node.description: Carpeting the color of a death shroud covers the floor, devouring the light as hungrily as Aldauth consumes souls. The walls are devoid of decoration, instead painted a uniform black to match the floor. Only the doors leading to initiates' cells betray any hint of color in this otherwise cold, bleak room.

node.name: Tower West, Earth Floor
node.description: Bare, dark soil forms the floor underfoot. The stony walls surrounding this circular room are similarly devoid of decoration, keeping instead the plain, natural look preferred by those mages who favor the element of Earth. Doors leading to the initiates' private cells line the walls.

node.name: Arnack's Tavern, Bar Room
node.description: At first glimpse the tavern offers all the sign outside promises. In one corner a pair of aged men play instruments and sing the occasional tune, while the other side of the room holds a number of tables and chairs for comfort and conversation. A barkeep bustles around, behind a bar in the back of the room, barking at servers to hustle and at the same time keeping a welcoming smile for all the customers.

node.name: Arnack's Tavern, Private Room
node.description: A table sits in the middle of this small room, surrounded by cushioned chairs. A window in the back wall looks into the forest, limbs occasionally knocking against the glass with the sway of the wind. The bustle of the main room is mostly muffled here allowing quiet and privacy if needed.

node.name: Rocky Outcrop, Chasm
node.description: Although cramped, this chasm connects two hollows and allows rainwater to flow away from the tiny oasis to the north. Tiny pools of water dot the sandy floor. Numerous large footprints almost obscure the dry runnels linking the puddles.

node.name: Rocky Outcrop, Hollow
node.description: This small hollow in the stone of the outcrop is surprisingly pleasant. Dry rivulets in the ground suggest that rainwater carries loose dirt from higher on the mound and deposits it here, creating an oasis of both soil and water. A variety of plants grow in this place -- little yellow bell-shaped flowers, puffy white ones, and tiny purple ones that grow scattered amongst all the others. A vine with shiny leaves climbs up the walls, softening the otherwise harsh contours of the stone.

node.name: Rocky Outcrop, Hollow
node.description: Lush vines climb the sheer walls, growing up out of the deep pool that collects much of the runoff from the rocks above. No exits exist but the one entrance, with the sheer rockface allowing no escape. A litter of dried leaves and other debris lies scattered on the sandy ground.

node.name: Wilderness, Aberro Valley
node.description: Disappearing among the thick bushes and underbrush in the south, the trail north winds through the forest. Pressed leaves and snapped twigs litter the ground, evidence of heavy use.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Trampled Path
node.description: Twisting and turning through the trees, the meandering turns of the beaten track hinder visibility in all directions. The sound of a nearby river filters through the dense trees.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Trampled Path
node.description: Skimming through the area on the west, a narrow river draws the local wildlife to it. The chirrups of birds and various other animal noises can be discerned accompanying the flash of movement along the river's bank.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Trampled Path
node.description: Darkened beneath the dense trees, the forest sprawls across slowly sloping hills. A fallen tree or two lean against those that still stand, as if unwilling to give up.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Trampled Path
node.description: Beginning to harden, the trail here grades into something more akin to gravel toward the south. Several paths lead off into the darkened bosk, zigzagging through the woods.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rocky Trail
node.description: Laden with gravel, the trail becomes a climbing path, circling upwards and downwards on a hill within the large valley. Trees and underbrush cling to life in the rocky ground, their sparse limbs stretching upwards.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rocky Trail
node.description: Upon the apex of a smaller hill, the trail here sketches itself deeper into the valley below on one side and rises steeply into a rocky track to the east. Short grasses grow along the sides of the path, opening up into brief, truncated areas where a traveler may take a cautious rest.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rocky Trail
node.description: Sparse vegetation dots the area here, leaving a precariously sloping path of gravel that winds its way through the valley. In the distance, the calls of various creatures can be heard.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rolling Hills
node.description: The parched landscape gives way to a rolling piedmont of hills that rise slowly upward toward a distant cliff face. Low brush and sparse vegetation grows along the trail.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rock Slide
node.description: Large, jagged boulders jut upward from the ground like misaligned teeth, creating a macabre illusion of a lower jawbone across the hillside. Patches of lichen and moss have wedged themselves betwixt the stones.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rock Slide
node.description: Despite the forests and greenery in the distance, in this elevated area of the valley, the air is arid and dusty. Rock and gravel, stirred by passersby and animals, rise into the air, clogging it and giving it a gritty taste.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rolling Hills
node.description: Growing in lushness, the underbrush here houses the occasional small creature that fills the air with sporadic sounds of movement. Perhaps felled by a particularly strong storm, a large tree trunk lies adjacent to the path.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Barren Hillside
node.description: Cloistered near the cliff, a large dark hill rises in the distance, while the path towards the west slopes downward. A small, stone well has been constructed here accompanied by the putrid smell of something long dead wafting from its depths.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Rolling Hills
node.description: Verdant abundance coats the hillside with a profusion of plants and small saplings. Farther to the west, a sheer cliff wall rises upwards, marring the horizon with a dark, looming presence, as if something evil waited there.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Barren Hillside
node.description: Growing slippery, the once sturdy and grassy ground falls away to a consistently muddy surface in this area. Looming against the horizon, the hulking mass of a dark cliff face rises upward.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Narrow Stream
node.description: Lush grass carpets the ground on the rocky slope. Water seeps from the hillside, joining together into a small stream that flows to the west.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Narrow Stream
node.description: The small stream cascades down the slope, channeling a valley to the west. Despite the nearby water, the surrounding brush is sparsely distributed across the hillside.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Narrow Stream
node.description: A deadfall dams part of the stream's path as it flows down the valley, creating a small pond. Next to the pool, the remains of a campfire suggest that some traveler once used this space as a shelter.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Ravine
node.description: The banks of the stream continue to grow steeper and rockier. Though the flow of water is still a mere trickle, over time this stream has made an impressive mark on the landscape.

node.name: Aberro Valley, Fetid Pool
node.description: As the stream takes a turn southward, the source of the stench becomes apparent. The flow of water is blocked here by massive amounts of rotting refuse, causing the water to pool. Bones, flesh, and rotting plants mingle with things less identifiable but more vile in a noxious soup. To the north, a sheer cliff face rises upward.

node.name: Aberro Cliffs, Above a Pool
node.description: Trees cling precariously to the cliff face, their leaves rustling in the blessedly fresh breeze. The small stream below glistens in its ravine, sparkling and clear until its end at the putrid pool.

node.name: Aberro Cliffs, Cliff Face
node.description: The trees here are more scraggly than those lower on the cliff face. A dead sapling hangs unsteadily from a single remaining root. Though unsuited to trees, the rocks do offer enough cracks and protrusions for climbing.

node.name: Aberro Cliffs, Cliff Face
node.description: The rock face here is too sheer and solid for trees to take purchase, but tufts of tough grass sprout from occasional cracks. Below, the specific features of the valley are lost in sea of green that is the forest.

node.name: Aberro Cliffs, Beneath a Precipice
node.description: A narrow ledge offers respite from the grueling climb. Above, the rock juts out sharply, providing some protection from the elements. Just large enough to give a foothold, a small crack appears in the cliff face to the right of the overhang.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Cliff's Edge
node.description: A crude palisade assembled from assorted bones provides the last hand hold on the climb from the cliff face. The palisade forms a semi-circle around the camp, but nothing guards the sheer drop over the cliff side. Despite the perilous plunge, the precipice presents a commanding view.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Palisade
node.description: Assorted bones form a crude palisade, guarding the approach to the camp. Nothing guards the sheer drop over the cliff side, where defenders could push potential invaders. Darkness masks the difference between stone and air, making the drop more perilous.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Interior Sally Port
node.description: Just large enough to hold all occupants of the camp, forays into enemy territory launch from this location. Debris litters the edges of this small gathering area.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Bivouac
node.description: Dismal tents sit low to the ground, providing small protection from the elements. Noxious odors drift over from the latrine. A small cedar tree clings to the mountainside just above the tents.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Firepit
node.description: Extinguished, the firepit houses burnt bones, meat, and gristle. Suspended by a massive bone spit, an abomination waits for the cooks to finish roasting it. The odor of the partially cooked meat smells rather like a latrine.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Command
node.description: This area doubles as housing for the commander and a briefing room. The mountain encloses three sides of the area, while a tarp suspended from the stone provides shelter.

node.name: Xala'Shar Camp, Supplies
node.description: Empty crates litter the room, tossed in heaps once the quartermaster removed the contents. The hinges on an open crate squeak as they sway in the wind.

node.name: The Grove, Ancient Tree
node.description: Creaking limbs and branches intertwine to form a makeshift floor. Within this airy landing, the cured hide of some long dead beast sways between two leafy boughs. Scattered upon the floor, in several haphazard piles, lay mounds of various pelts. Dangling from overhead like some macabre wind chime, a collection of skulls sways in the shifting breeze.

Several fireflies dart about the limbs and branches, lighting this airy landing. An outline of a hide can be seen stretched between two branches. Scattered along the floor are several lumpy mounds and a shadowy string of skulls hang from a nearby branch.

node.name: Hunting Preserve, Woodpile
node.description: On top of this unsteady perch you have a view of the surrounding area. Most directions are blocked by the heavy growth of trees, but the ruined chimneys of the manor poke above the treeline like broken teeth in a decaying mouth. Not too far away, you catch a glimpse of the river that flows by the preserve.

node.name: Wolf Clan Home, Lodge Interior
node.description: The walls of the lodge are covered with the hides and skins of many different animals. You recognize the pelts of otter, fox, deer and wolf. Despite the spacious size of the lodge, the air in the windowless building is thick and hazy. You can smell the residue of an aromatic, heavy smoke. A large firepit in the center of the room is placed below the ceiling's smoke hole. A massive rack attached to one wall holds enough weapons for a small army.

node.name: Wolf Clan Home, Firepit
node.description: The air around the firepit is heavy with a sweet-smelling smoke. A hole in the ceiling, directly above the pit, provides some relief with an occasional breeze. Carved pipes and rattles made from gourds have been left on the dirt floor. A tall barbarian warrior sits next to the fire, carefully attaching some eagle feathers to the end of a lance.

node.name: Wolf Clan Home, Hidden Path
node.description: A narrow path has been cleared through the clumps of sage bushes, tall grasses, untended wildflowers that grow abundantly here. The tall somber trees of Wildulf Woods form a wall beyond a clearing to the north. A small, cramped doorway leads back into the lodge.

node.name: Wolf Clan Home, Seer's Circle
node.description: Within the densely-packed timberland sits a round, flat arena hemmed by a circle of hewn logs. Two additional logs have been set at opposite sides of this circle, each adorned with talismans of feathers and beads affixed to the skulls of wolves. Beneath them, leather strips dyed in bright colors dance and flutter in the soft breeze. The arena itself is composed of hard-packed dirt which bears the scars of innumerable steps, slides and turns executed in some kind of precise, battle-inspired dance.

node.name: Wolf Clan Home, Secluded Clearing
node.description: A single aged willow tree stands in the center of this wide clearing, its drooping boughs sway and creak, reaching for the ground. This ancient symbol of death and rebirth shelters an open-air shrine that has been erected at the base of the tree's gnarled trunk. Small tufts of broad-leafed hosta plants surround the shrine. Impenetrable walls of densely-packed trees and brush cut off any exit except to the south.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: Scratched into the dirt of the pathway is the remains of a circle with most of its line scuffed out. Taken together with the disturbed area within the bounds, the purpose of the improvised wrestling ground is clear. This open space between houses must often be used for such purposes, as there are a number of logs set upright near the edge of the road, ready to serve as seats for spectators.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: A few boulders, left in place when the area was set up for housing, stand beside the road. A few passersby have crudely hacked their names into the surface of the stones, sometimes with dates or other messages. The houses stand well back from the roadway, most without fencing to separate them from their fellows.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: Sounds of metal being pounded come from within a shed attached to the side of a nearby house. Wisps of smoke drift from the stovepipe jutting from the shed's roof, further evidence of metalwork being performed within. Other homes nearby lack such sheds, but all are well-maintained.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: Hanging from a tree in the middle of the road is a colorful archery target, its surface much pierced from heavy use. A number of scuffed-out lines show where the residents have used the roadway as an improvised archery range.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: Some of the nearby houses are surrounded by expanses of lawn but others have more working-class yards with small workbenches set up under the trees where residents can repair things while enjoying the open air. All the homes, however, are sturdy and well-maintained against the weather.

node.name: Wolf Clan, Wolverine Ward
node.description: Children's bows and wooden weapons are strewn about one yard, obviously where an impromptu battle took place. The cries of the children can be discerned in the distance, where they have run off to continue their play.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: Scattered along the dusty path are discarded weapon parts in various states of repair. Ramshackle buildings crowd the pathway, their weathered boards and bricks giving an air of dilapadation to the area.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: The ramshackle buildings huddle close to each other, as if seeking support and protection against the ravages of time and weather. The almost uniform decrepit state they are in testifies to the fact that more than mutual support is needed to prevent the ravages of poverty and decay.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: Standing on a stout wooden platform, a metal pump head provides the inhabitants with fresh water. The platform helps channel the runoff into a culvert that runs between the battered buildings of the area and disappears from sight. The many tracks of bare feet through the dust testify to the heavy use the pump gets from the neighborhood.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: Crowded close together, the run-down buildings seem to lean against each other for support. A few children's toys lie scattered in the dust of the main roadway, their cheerful colors a striking contrast with the general lack of color on the buildings.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: A trickle of muddy water crosses the dirt path here, its mucky waters filled with unidentifiable bits of slime and debris. Wide tree trucks have been placed across the streamlet to provide a safe and sturdy crossing for the neighborhood's inhabitants.

node.name: Knife Clan, Steelpine Circle
node.description: Standing in the middle of a wide spot in the road is a octagonal message board covered in fading signs and notices. Houses and shacks that are barely shelter line the dusty street, their walls and roofs barely able to keep out the weather.

node.name: Lake of Dreams, White Gladiolus Greenhouse
node.description: Nestled between Mycthengelde and the Lake of Dreams, a verdant hollow is encased in glass to form a greenhouse that is filled with frilled gladiolus blossoms. Long tables placed at the center of the building are dressed in silk and ivy, each lit by rows of flickering candles. Gentle ripples drift across the silvery surface of the nearby water, evidence of the stately procession of a pair of graceful white swans.
A verdant lakeside hollow blooms with gladiolus blossoms. Long tables are placed at the center of the glade.

The deep, heady scent of gladiolus blossoms lingers in the night air, pervading a verdant lakeside hollow encased in glass and cloaked in darkness. Rows of candles throw dancing shadows across long tables placed at the center of the building. Flickering fireflies bob gently to and fro, their mesmerizing light reflected upon the placid surface of the nearby water.
The scent of gladiolus blossoms lingers in the night air, pervading a verdant lakeside hollow. Long tables are placed at the center of the glade.
